paper_abstract: We provide information about the asymptotic regimes for a homogeneous fragmentation of a finite set. We establish a phase transition for the asymptotic behavior of the shattering times, defined as the first instants when all the blocks of the partition process have cardinality less than a fixed integer. Our results may be applied to the study of certain random split trees. (C) 2010 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Random Struct. Alg., 39, 247-274, 2011
paper_title: A Phase Transition for the Heights of a Fragmentation Tree
